index.name: css
index.subtitle: CSS
index.about: Cascading Style Sheets, most of the time abbreviated as CSS, is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML (including various XML languages like SVG or XHTML). CSS describes how the structured element must be rendered on screen, on paper, in speech, or on other media.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about CSS.

videos.title: Introduction to CSS and Adding a CSS File to Your HTML
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be introducing you to CSS and show you how to add a css document to your site.

videos.title: CSS Syntax and Adding Color to Text
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be giving an overview of CSS syntax and showing you your first css code by adding color to text.

videos.title: Styling Backgrounds
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing the background property and how you can use it to add color and image backgrounds to your sites.

videos.title: How to Style Text
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing you how to style text.

videos.title: How to change your font
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be introducing you to the font property of CSS.

videos.title: How to style links
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be introducing link states and how to style them in CSS.

videos.title: Styling Lists to Create a Horizontal Navigaton
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to take a ul and turn it into a horizontal list most commonly used in navigation sections.

videos.title: Box Model - Changing the Height and Width
videos.description: In this lesson, we will introduce you to the CSS box model and teach you how to set the height and width of your elements.

videos.title: Box Model - Margins and How To Center a Div
videos.description: In this lesson, we will help you understand the outer layer of the box-model. With margin you can position your elements and how to center a div.

videos.title: Box Model - Borders
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use the next layer in the box model, the border.

videos.title: Box Model - Padding
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use the next layer in the box model with padding.

videos.title: DRY Code and Grouping and Nesting Selectors
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use CSS techniques to keep you from repeating yourself in code.

videos.title: Min and Max Width and Height To Control Your Elements
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to better control the dimensions of your elements with Min-width/height, max-width/height.

videos.title: Controlling Display with the Display Property
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use the display property.

videos.title: Positioning your Elements
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to position your elements with position: relative, absolute, and fixed.

videos.title: Creating a Two Column Layouts with Floats
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to create a two column layout and understanding a very useful property of CSS.

videos.title: CSS Pseudo Class Selectors
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to add some interesting effects and interactions with pseudo class selectors.

videos.title: Before and After Pseudo Elements
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use the unique pseudo elements, Before and After.

videos.title: Child Selectors
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use the child selector, to narrow the focus of what you are trying to style.

videos.title: What is CSS3?
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be describing css3 and what we will be doing with it in the next tutorials.

videos.title: Border Radius
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to add rounded corners with css border-radius.

videos.title: Text Shadow
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to add drop shadows to text using the text-shadow property.

videos.title: Box Shadow
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to add drop shadows to items on the page.

videos.title: Box Sizing - Border Box aka How To Fix the Box Model
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to make the box model more tolerable with Box Sizing: border-box.

videos.title: Linear Gradients in CSS3
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to add a gradient to your page.

videos.title: Animating States with Transition
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing you how to add animation on state change with transition.

videos.title: How to rotate something with CSS3
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to rotate your objects using only css.

videos.title: Animation with CSS3
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to make the objects animate using CSS3.

videos.title: Using Google WebFonts
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to use Google Web Fonts for more interesting web typography.

videos.title: Custom Fonts With @font face
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to host your own fonts with @font-face.

videos.title: How To Use Multiple Background Images in CSS
videos.description: In this lesson, I'll be showing how to have multiple background images and layer them using css3.

videos.title: Columns with CSS
videos.description: Here we show you how to use CSS columns in your projects.

videos.title: List Columns
videos.description: Here we show you how to make sure your lists properly flow into their columns using CSS columns.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Card Flipping Effect
videos.description: Here we show you how to create a 3d flipping card transition on hover.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Card Flipping Effect Part 2
videos.description: Here we continue where the previous video left off showing you how to add content to the front and back of your flipping card.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Slide Over Menu
videos.description: Here we show you how to build a 'Slide Over' off canvas navigation menu using just a tiny bit of jQuery to toggle a class.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Push Over Menu
videos.description: Here we show you how to build a "Push Over" off canvas navigation menu using just a tiny bit of jQuery to toggle a class.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - CSS Accordion
videos.description: Here we show you how to create a slide down or slide toggle with only CSS to control the animation.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Pulsing Button
videos.description: Here I show you how to create a button that has a pulsating outline on hover.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Sliding Door Reveal
videos.description: In this CSS Experiment, we create a 'sliding door' that animates sliding away on hover.

videos.title: CSS Experiments - Button Background Reveal
videos.description: In this CSS Experiment, we show a sliding background reveal that even wipes the foreground text.
